verses.verse: And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Balak <S%H1111><s%>, Build <S%H1129><s%> me here seven <S%H7651><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%>, and prepare <S%H3559><s%> me here seven <S%H7651><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>.

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Balaam <S%H1109><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%>; and Balak <S%H1111><s%> and Balaam <S%H1109><s%> offered <S%H5927><s%> on every altar <S%H4196><s%> a bullock <S%H6499><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%>.

And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Balak <S%H1111><s%>, Stand <S%H3320><s%> by thy burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and I will go <S%H3212><s%>: peradventure Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will come <S%H7136><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> me <S%H1697><s%>; and whatsoever he showeth <S%H7200><s%> me I will tell <S%H5046><s%> thee <S%H3212><s%>. And he went to a bare height <S%H8205><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> met <S%H7136><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H6186><s%>, I have prepared the seven <S%H7651><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%>, and I have offered <S%H5927><s%> up a bullock <S%H6499><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> on every altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> in Balaam <S%H1109><s%>'s mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Return <S%H7725><s%> unto Balak <S%H1111><s%>, and thus thou shalt speak <S%H1696><s%>.
And he returned <S%H7725><s%> unto him <S%H5324><s%>, and, lo, he was standing by his burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, he <S%H8269><s%>, and all the princes of Moab <S%H4124><s%>.

And he took up <S%H5375><s%> his parable <S%H4912><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, From Aram <S%H758><s%> hath Balak <S%H1111><s%> brought <S%H5148><s%> me <S%H4428><s%>, The king of Moab <S%H4124><s%> from the mountains <S%H2042><s%> of the East <S%H6924><s%>: Come <S%H3212><s%>, curse <S%H779><s%> me Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, And come <S%H3212><s%>, defy <S%H2194><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
How <S%H4100><s%> shall I curse <S%H5344><s%>, whom God <S%H410><s%> hath not cursed <S%H6895><s%>? And how shall I defy <S%H2194><s%>, whom Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath not defied <S%H2194><s%>?

For from the top <S%H7218><s%> of the rocks <S%H6697><s%> I see <S%H7200><s%> him <S%H1389><s%>, And from the hills I behold <S%H7789><s%> him <S%H5971><s%>: lo, it is a people that dwelleth <S%H7931><s%> alone <S%H910><s%>, And shall not be reckoned <S%H2803><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>.

Who can count <S%H4487><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, Or number <S%H4557><s%> the fourth <S%H7255><s%> part of Israel <S%H3478><s%>? Let me die <S%H4191><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the righteous <S%H3477><s%>, And let my last end be like his <S%H319><s%>!

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, What hast thou done <S%H6213><s%> unto me <S%H3947><s%>? I took thee to curse <S%H6895><s%> mine enemies <S%H341><s%>, and <S%H1288><s%>, behold, thou hast blessed them altogether <S%H1288><s%>.
And he answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, Must I not take heed <S%H8104><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> that which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> putteth <S%H7760><s%> in my mouth <S%H6310><s%>?

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3212><s%>, Come, I pray thee <S%H312><s%>, with me unto another place <S%H4725><s%>, from whence thou mayest see <S%H7200><s%> them <S%H7200><s%>; thou shalt see but <S%H657><s%> the utmost <S%H7097><s%> part of them <S%H7200><s%>, and shalt not see them all <S%H6895><s%>: and curse me them from thence.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> him into the field <S%H7704><s%> of Zophim <S%H6839><s%>, to the top <S%H7218><s%> of Pisgah <S%H6449><s%>, and built <S%H1129><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%>, and offered <S%H5927><s%> up a bullock <S%H6499><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> on every altar <S%H4196><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%> unto Balak <S%H1111><s%>, Stand <S%H3320><s%> here <S%H3541><s%> by thy burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, while I meet <S%H7136><s%> Jehovah yonder <S%H3541><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> met <S%H7136><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> in his mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Return <S%H7725><s%> unto Balak <S%H1111><s%>, and thus shalt thou speak <S%H1696><s%>.

And he came <S%H935><s%> to him <S%H5324><s%>, and, lo, he was standing by his burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> with him <S%H1111><s%>. And Balak said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3068><s%>, What hath Jehovah spoken <S%H1696><s%>?

And he took up <S%H5375><s%> his parable <S%H4912><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Rise up <S%H6965><s%>, Balak <S%H1111><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%>; Hearken <S%H238><s%> unto me <S%H1121><s%>, thou son of Zippor <S%H6834><s%>:

God <S%H410><s%> is not a man <S%H376><s%>, that he should lie <S%H3576><s%>, Neither the son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, that he should repent <S%H5162><s%>: Hath he said <S%H559><s%>, and will he not do <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H1696><s%>? Or hath he spoken, and will he not make it good <S%H6965><s%>?
Behold <S%H3947><s%>, I have received commandment to bless <S%H1288><s%>: And he hath blessed <S%H1288><s%>, and I cannot reverse it <S%H7725><s%>.

He hath not beheld <S%H5027><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%> in Jacob <S%H3290><s%>; Neither hath he seen <S%H7200><s%> perverseness <S%H5999><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> his God <S%H430><s%> is with him <S%H8643><s%>, And the shout of a king is among them <S%H4428><s%>.
God <S%H410><s%> bringeth them forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; He hath as it were the strength <S%H8443><s%> of the wild-ox <S%H7214><s%>.

Surely there is no enchantment <S%H5173><s%> with Jacob <S%H3290><s%>; Neither is there any divination <S%H7081><s%> with Israel <S%H3478><s%>: Now <S%H6256><s%> shalt it be said <S%H559><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, What hath God <S%H410><s%> wrought <S%H6466><s%>!

Behold <S%H5971><s%>, the people riseth up <S%H6965><s%> as a lioness <S%H3833><s%>, And as a lion <S%H3833><s%> doth he lift himself up <S%H5375><s%>: He shall not lie down <S%H7901><s%> until he eat <S%H398><s%> of the prey <S%H2964><s%>, And drink <S%H8354><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the slain <S%H2491><s%>.
And Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, Neither curse <S%H5344><s%> them at all <S%H6895><s%>, nor bless <S%H1288><s%> them at all <S%H1288><s%>.

But Balaam <S%H1109><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto Balak <S%H1111><s%>, Told <S%H1696><s%> not I thee <S%H559><s%>, saying, All that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> speaketh <S%H1696><s%>, that I must do <S%H6213><s%>?

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, Come <S%H3212><s%> now <S%H3947><s%>, I will take thee unto another <S%H312><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>; peradventure it will please <S%H3474><s%> God <S%H430><s%> that thou mayest curse me them from thence <S%H6895><s%>.
And Balak <S%H1111><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> unto the top <S%H7218><s%> of Peor <S%H6465><s%>, that looketh <S%H8259><s%> down <S%H6440><s%> upon the desert <S%H3452><s%>.

And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Balak <S%H1111><s%>, Build <S%H1129><s%> me here seven <S%H7651><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%>, and prepare <S%H3559><s%> me here seven <S%H7651><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>.
And Balak <S%H1111><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Balaam <S%H1109><s%> had said <S%H559><s%>, and offered <S%H5927><s%> up a bullock <S%H6499><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> on every altar <S%H4196><s%>.
